articles.author: Lee Ying Shan
articles.title: Asia markets trade mixed ahead of China inflation data; Uniqlo owner shares jump 7% - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets were set to trade higher Friday as investors parse China's inflation data coming out later in the day.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets traded mixed on Friday as investors parsed China's inflation data coming out later in the day.
China's CSI 300 fell 0.25% after its December consumer prices rose 0.8% from a yea… [+2745 chars]
